name: Kiwi (spirit._machine)
description:
You wake up in a decrepit house. You must examine unsettling images on a computer monitor to identify and destroy threats.

Don't let it in.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Look
  • Left Click: Select
  • Right Click: Zoom In
  • Space: Help

Tools & Technology:

  • Unity3D game engine
  • Images made with Midjourney
  • Sound middleware: FMOD
  • Original audio created with Ableton Live

Assets:

  • HQ Modular Abandoned Mansion
  • Ghoul-zombie
  • Audio from QuickSounds
